entry.title: Box Revived v0.3 Beta 3
entry.summary: Box Revived v0.3 Beta 3 added Powerups to the Beta! It is currently in beta, and i CERTAINLY expect atleast one bug. If there is any bugs, tell me on Discord. Code Snippet: when I start as a clone (SE) go to x: (pick random)…
entry.content:
Box Revived v0.3 Beta 3 added Powerups to the Beta! It is currently in beta, and i CERTAINLY expect atleast one bug. If there is any bugs, tell me on Discord.

Code Snippet:

when I start as a clone (SE)
go to x: (pick random) - Picks a random X Position between -206 and 206

switch costume to (pick random) - Picks random costume and switches to it

Rest - Checks costume number and broadcasts the powerup according to the costume.

entry.title: AmethystDev Devlog
entry.summary: Welcome to my Devlog that i will update around every week. I will add some update logs from my game, https://playboxrevived.amethystdev.com and others OwO :3
